name: Slime Cake
description:
Slime is hungry and wants cake, but the cakes all seem to be out of reach! Although Slime can eat food for various boosts to get to the cake, it seems it will eat any food on touch without control!

Slime Cake contains simple mechanics yet challenging puzzles where player must be cautious of which food they eat in order. The puzzles get increasingly harder with various foods that counteract with each other.

SlimeCake version 0.096 (early demo)

GAME IS EARLY IN DEVELOPMENT

(I'm still very new to unity and learning new things everyday!)

feedbacks are always appreciated!

Huge thanks to Rhy and others for help testing the game so far!
